content: Because there was no Google API for swift, I built a pure-Swift wrapper around Google APIs.
It is built on Swift's codable & NIO, is fully asynchronous & is designed for server use.
It can fetch, modify, send and reply to emails.
It can also create & modify Google Sheets.
Moreover, it has a custom API to allow for the maintainence of a database on Google Sheets in O(logN) time
